<< append Control System functions balreal >>

augstate

Append state vector to output vector.

Syntax

sysa = augstate(sys)
[Aa, Ba, Ca, Da] = augstate(A, B, C, D)

Input argument

sys

LTI model.

Output argument

sysa

State-space model with states appended to the outputs.

Description

The function sysa = augstate(sys) adds the state vector to the outputs of a state-space model.

Example

sys = ss(10, 10, 20, 0);
sysa = augstate(sys)

See also

feedback, series.

History

Version Description
1.0.0 initial version

Author

Allan CORNET
